summary: Completed testing of Wasla Django merchant dashboard. Backend authentication and dashboard pages work correctly via API. Frontend has login form UI issues but dashboard structure and RTL layout are properly implemented.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 403 Forbidden due to CSRF protection
flaky_endpoints.impact: Language switching via POST request fails

ui_bugs.issue: Login tab switching not working properly - stays on registration form

integration_issues.issue: Login form submission not redirecting to dashboard despite correct credentials

passed_tests: Dashboard authentication redirect (unauthenticated users redirected to /auth/)
Backend API login with merchant@test.com credentials
Dashboard overview page loads with KPI cards and recent orders
Dashboard AI tools page loads correctly
Dashboard store settings page loads correctly
Sidebar navigation links present with correct data-testid attributes
Language switcher button present in topbar
Dashboard layout structure (sidebar, topbar, main content) implemented correctly
Consistent dashboard styling using dashboard.css classes

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (login issues prevent full testing but structure is correct)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend login form tab switching functionality. The login tab click is not properly switching from registration to login form. Backend authentication works correctly via API but frontend form has UI issues. Also fix CSRF protection for language switching endpoint.
